angular_dialog_patterns-00001.content: Place Angular dialogs outside page-card containers for backdrop-filter
angular_dialog_patterns-00001.justification: Project-specific rule documented in CLAUDE.md #8, reinforced by successful refactoring that removed ~265 lines of redundant code
angular_dialog_patterns-00001.evidence: Commit 335620d: 'dialógusok egységesítése - page-card-on kívülre emelés'. CLAUDE.md rule #8: 'Dialógusok page-card KÍVÜL - backdrop-filter stacking context miatt!'

tooling_workarounds-00002.content: Use ace-learn --lines N flag after /resume sessions
tooling_workarounds-00002.justification: Enforceable workaround for recurring ace-learn CLI failure (exit code 1) when transcript context is incomplete
tooling_workarounds-00002.evidence: ace-learn failed with exit code 1 after 9 retries; help output revealed --lines flag; tool hint confirmed 'transcript context may be incomplete after /resume'
